info.title: Klaviyo API (Alpha)
info.description: The Klaviyo REST API. Please visit https://developers.klaviyo.com for more details.

post.description:
> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2024-07-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. Adds the tag(s) in the request body to the campaign in the URL

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `3/s`
Steady: `60/m` **Scopes:** `campaigns:write` `tags:write`

get.description:
> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2024-07-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. Get all forms in an account.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `3/s`
Steady: `60/m` **Scopes:** `forms:read`

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
For more information please visit https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/v2024-07-15.pre/reference/api-overview#filtering
Allowed field(s)/operator(s):
`id`: `any`, `equals`
`name`: `any`, `contains`, `equals`
`ab_test`: `equals`
`updated_at`: `greater-or-equal`, `greater-than`, `less-or-equal`, `less-than`
`created_at`: `greater-or-equal`, `greater-than`, `less-or-equal`, `less-than`
`status`: `equals`

get.description:

get.description:
> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2024-07-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. Get all template universal contents in an account.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `10/s`
Steady: `150/m` **Scopes:** `templates:read`

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
For more information please visit https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/v2024-07-15.pre/reference/api-overview#filtering
Allowed field(s)/operator(s):
`id`: `any`, `equals`
`name`: `any`, `equals`
`created`: `greater-or-equal`, `greater-than`, `less-or-equal`, `less-than`
`updated`: `greater-or-equal`, `greater-than`, `less-or-equal`, `less-than`
`definition.content_type`: `equals`
`definition.type`: `equals`

post.description:
> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2024-07-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. Create a template universal content.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `10/s`
Steady: `150/m` **Scopes:** `templates:write`

get.description:
> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2024-07-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. Get the template universal content with the given ID.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `10/s`
Steady: `150/m` **Scopes:** `templates:read`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the universal content

schema.description: The ID of the universal content

patch.description:

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the template universal content

schema.description: The ID of the template universal content

requestBody.description: Update a universal content by ID

delete.description:
> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2024-07-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the template universal content

schema.description: The ID of the template universal content

id.description: The ID of the universal content

name.description: The name for this universal content

created.description: The datetime when this universal content was created

updated.description: The datetime when this universal content was updated

screenshot_status.description: The status of a universal content screenshot.

id.description: ID of the form. Generated by Klaviyo.

status.description: Status of the form. A live form with an in-progress draft is considered "live".

ab_test.description: Whether the form has an A/B test configured, regardless of its status.

created_at.description: ISO8601 timestamp when the form was created.

updated_at.description: ISO8601 timestamp when the form was last updated.

name.description: The name for this universal content

id.description: The ID of the universal content

name.description: The name for this universal content

created.description: The datetime when this universal content was created

updated.description: The datetime when this universal content was updated

screenshot_status.description: The status of a universal content screenshot.

id.description: The ID of the template universal content

name.description: The name for this template universal content

id.description: The ID of the universal content

name.description: The name for this universal content

created.description: The datetime when this universal content was created

updated.description: The datetime when this universal content was updated

screenshot_status.description: The status of a universal content screenshot.

id.description: ID of the form version. Generated by Klaviyo.

status.description: Status of the form version. "live" means it's live on site.

created_at.description: ISO8601 timestamp when the form version was created.

updated_at.description: ISO8601 timestamp when the form version was last updated.

variation_name.description: This is the name of the AB test variation.

Klaviyo-API-Key.name: Authorization
Klaviyo-API-Key.description:
Private key authentication for /api/ endpoints is performed by setting the `Authorization` header to `Klaviyo-API-Key your-private-api-key`
For more information please visit https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/v2024-07-15.pre/reference/api-overview#authentication
